body:
Hello all, I know that the question have been asked before, and I did follow chris's tutorial, but for some reason the new material does not appear in the library.

[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dMNnaPiQ3VgladoTcimsl3b*AxkqzLn6LzwM0-H4bqX6Z8Vm1eWQXZScYUcvjlHntveuW1QSOjK3ga6mOEORW78nfmyezL2S/win.jpg)Is this the right connection for a window material? 
is it related to being a no-mass window? because I only have the u-value and the SHGC.

thanks in advance.
topic: Problem with adding Window EP Material to Library
